// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:    22 /02/2011 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.   09/ 2011 
 
 
 
Subject:-  Access of Vehicle upto the aircraft at civil airports in the country 
       on  protocol /security / medical grounds.  
 
 
       Please refer to this Bureau AVSEC Circular No.02/2010  dated 13/01/2010, 
on the subject mentioned above.  
 
 
02. 
       Shri S.Jaipal Reddy, Hon’ble Minister for Petroleum, is permitted to 
avail facility of Airport Operator’s ferry vehicle to and from aircraft, during arrival 
and departure at all civil airports in the country for a further period of one year, on 
medical grounds. 
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf.
